imdb.plot outline: When money means power, and power sets the law, does the end always justify the means--even if it leads to murder? In the fictitious nation of Karombe, the president has just died. Soon generals, brothers and agents of the state are vying for succession and control of the country's vast natural resources. In a battle of passion, honor, bloodshed and even magic, the powerful underbelly of a global political machinery is revealed in this high-octane political thriller played out across Africa, the UK, France and the USA.
imdb.title: Kingmakers
plot: When money means power, and power sets the law, does the end always justify the means--even if it leads to murder? In the fictitious nation of Karombe, the president has just died.
